name: @rtaa/ingest-service
description: WebSocket ingestion service for PCM16 audio frames

scripts.prebuild: npm run validate:env || echo '⚠️  Environment validation skipped (non-blocking)'
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && tsc -p tsconfig.json || (echo '❌ TypeScript compilation failed' && exit 1)
scripts.build:lib: cd ../../lib/pubsub && tsc && echo '✅ Compiled lib/pubsub' || echo '⚠️  lib/pubsub compilation skipped'; cd ../.. && (npx tsc lib/call-registry.ts --outDir lib --module commonjs --target ES2020 --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --resolveJsonModule && echo '✅ Compiled lib/call-registry') || echo '⚠️  lib/call-registry compilation skipped'; node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const libFile='lib/call-registry.js'; const distFile='services/ingest/dist/call-registry.js'; if(fs.existsSync(libFile)) { const distDir='services/ingest/dist'; if(!fs.existsSync(distDir)) fs.mkdirSync(distDir, {recursive:true}); fs.copyFileSync(libFile, distFile); console.log('✅ Copied lib/call-registry.js to services/ingest/dist/'); } else { console.warn('⚠️  lib/call-registry.js not found, skipping copy'); }"
scripts.postbuild: npm run fix:paths && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); function moveFiles(srcDir, destDir) { if(!fs.existsSync(srcDir)) return; const files=fs.readdirSync(srcDir); files.forEach(f=>{ const srcPath=path.join(srcDir,f); const destPath=path.join(destDir,f); if(fs.statSync(srcPath).isDirectory()) { if(f!=='node_modules' && f!=='lib' && f!=='services') { moveFiles(srcPath, destDir); } } else if(f.endsWith('.js')) { if(!fs.existsSync(destPath) || srcPath!==destPath) { fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath); } } }); } function findNestedDir(dir) { if(!fs.existsSync(dir)) return null; const files=fs.readdirSync(dir); for(const f of files) { const p=path.join(dir,f); if(fs.statSync(p).isDirectory() && (f==='services' || f==='src')) { const nested=findNestedDir(p); if(nested) return nested; return p; } } return null; } const nested=findNestedDir('dist'); if(nested && nested!=='dist') { moveFiles(nested,'dist'); fs.rmSync(nested,{recursive:true,force:true}); console.log('✅ Moved compiled files to dist/'); } if(!fs.existsSync('dist/server.js')) { console.error('❌ Build failed: dist/server.js not found'); process.exit(1); } console.log('✅ Build successful: dist/server.js exists');"
scripts.fix:paths: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); function fixFile(filePath) { if(!fs.existsSync(filePath)) return; let content=fs.readFileSync(filePath,'utf8'); let changed=false; const fixes=[{from:/require\(['\"]@rtaa\/pubsub['\"]\)/g,to:'require(\"../../../lib/pubsub/dist\")'},{from:/require\(['\"]@rtaa\/pubsub\/topics['\"]\)/g,to:'require(\"../../../lib/pubsub/dist/topics\")'},{from:/require\(['\"]\.\.\/\.\.\/\.\.\/lib\/pubsub['\"]\)/g,to:'require(\"../../../lib/pubsub/dist\")'},{from:/require\(['\"]\.\.\/\.\.\/lib\/pubsub\/dist['\"]\)/g,to:'require(\"../../../lib/pubsub/dist\")'}]; fixes.forEach(f=>{const newContent=content.replace(f.from,f.to); if(newContent!==content){content=newContent;changed=true;} }); if(changed) fs.writeFileSync(filePath,content); } function walk(dir) { fs.readdirSync(dir).forEach(f=>{ const p=path.join(dir,f); if(fs.statSync(p).isDirectory()) walk(p); else if(f.endsWith('.js')) fixFile(p); }); } if(fs.existsSync('dist')) walk('dist'); console.log('✅ Fixed import paths');"
scripts.validate:env: node -e "const required=['REDIS_URL','PUBSUB_ADAPTER']; const missing=required.filter(r=>!process.env[r]); if(missing.length && process.env.NODE_ENV==='production') { console.error('❌ Missing required env vars:', missing.join(', ')); process.exit(1); } else if(missing.length) { console.warn('⚠️  Missing env vars (dev mode):', missing.join(', ')); }"
